verses.verse: וַיֵּרָ֤א <WH7200> appeared אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD בְּאֵלֹנֵ֖י <WH436> unto him in the plains מַמְרֵ֑א <WH4471> of Mamre וְה֛וּא <WH1931> he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> and he sat פֶּֽתַח־ <WH6607> door הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> in the tent כְּחֹ֥ם <WH2527> in the heat הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> of the day

וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> And he lift up עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּ֔רְא <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> behold שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> and lo three אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> men נִצָּבִ֖ים <WH5324> stood עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> opposite וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> by him and when he saw וַיָּ֤רָץ <WH7323> [them] he ran לִקְרָאתָם֙ <WH7125> to meet מִפֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> door הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> them from the tent וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <WH7812> and bowed אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> himself toward the ground

וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> And said אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH113> my lord אִם־ <WH518> if נָ֨א <WH4994> now מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> if now I have found חֵן֙ <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֥א <WH4994> please תַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> pass not away מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> I pray thee from thy servant

יֻקַּֽח־ <WH3947> be fetched נָ֣א <WH4994> I pray you מְעַט־ <WH4592> Let a little מַ֔יִם <WH4325> water וְרַחֲצ֖וּ <WH7364> and wash רַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7272> your feet וְהִֽשָּׁעֲנ֖וּ <WH8172> and rest yourselves תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הָעֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> under the tree

וְאֶקְחָ֨ה <WH3947> And I will fetch פַת־ <WH6595> a morsel לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> of bread וְסַעֲד֤וּ <WH5582> and comfort ye לִבְּכֶם֙ <WH3820> your hearts אַחַ֣ר <WH310> after that תַּעֲבֹ֔רוּ <WH5674> ye shall pass on כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> to כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So עֲבַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH5674> for therefore are ye come עַֽל־ <WH5921> and עַבְדְּכֶ֑ם <WH5650> your servant וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> as thou hast said כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> So do כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH1696> And they said

וַיְמַהֵ֧ר <WH4116> hastened אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> And Abraham הָאֹ֖הֱלָה <WH168> into the tent אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׂרָ֑ה <WH8283> unto Sarah וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said מַהֲרִ֞י <WH4116> Make ready quickly שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> three סְאִים֙ <WH5429> measures קֶ֣מַח <WH7058> meal סֹ֔לֶת <WH5560> of fine ל֖וּשִׁי <WH3888> knead וַעֲשִׂ֥י <WH6213> upon the hearth עֻגֽוֹת׃ <WH5692> cakes

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to הַבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> unto the herd רָ֣ץ <WH7323> ran אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> And Abraham וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> and fetcht בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted בָּקָ֜ר <WH1241> to the herd רַ֤ךְ <WH7390> tender וָטוֹב֙ <WH2896> and good וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and gave אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> [it] unto a young man וַיְמַהֵ֖ר <WH4116> and he hasted לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to dress אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> And he took חֶמְאָ֜ה <WH2529> butter וְחָלָ֗ב <WH2461> and milk וּבֶן־ <WH1121> afflicted הַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> bull אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> which he had dressed וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> and set לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> [it] before them וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> and he עֹמֵ֧ד <WH5975> and he stood עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> and תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הָעֵ֖ץ <WH6086> by them under the tree וַיֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> and they did eat

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֵׅלָׅ֔יׅוׅ <WH413> unto אַיֵּ֖ה <WH346> unto him Where שָׂרָ֣ה <WH8283> [is] Sarah אִשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <WH802> ess וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> There בָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> Behold in the tent

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said שׁ֣וֹב <WH7725> I will certainly אָשׁ֤וּב <WH7725> return אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> to you כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> unto thee according to the time חַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> of life וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold בֵ֖ן <WH1121> shall have a son לְשָׂרָ֣ה <WH8283> and lo Sarah אִשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <WH802> thy wife וְשָׂרָ֥ה <WH8283> And Sarah שֹׁמַ֛עַת <WH8085> heard פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> door הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> [it] in the tent וְה֥וּא <WH1931> which אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> which [was] behind him

וְאַבְרָהָ֤ם <WH85> Now Abraham וְשָׂרָה֙ <WH8283> and Sarah זְקֵנִ֔ים <WH2205> [were] old בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> [and] well stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> in age חָדַל֙ <WH2308> [and] it ceased לִהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> become לְשָׂרָ֔ה <WH8283> to be with Sarah אֹ֖רַח <WH734> after the manner כַּנָּשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> of women

וַתִּצְחַ֥ק <WH6711> laughed שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> Therefore Sarah בְּקִרְבָּ֣הּ <WH7130> within herself לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> After בְלֹתִי֙ <WH1086> I am waxed old הָֽיְתָה־ <WH1961> have לִּ֣י עֶדְנָ֔ה <WH5730> shall I have pleasure וַֽאדֹנִ֖י <WH113> my lord זָקֵֽן׃ <WH2204> being old also

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> unto Abraham לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Wherefore זֶּה֩ <WH2088> he צָחֲקָ֨ה <WH6711> laugh שָׂרָ֜ה <WH8283> did Sarah לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying הַאַ֥ף <WH637> yet אֻמְנָ֛ם <WH552> Shall I of a surety אֵלֵ֖ד <WH3205> bear וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> a child which זָקַֽנְתִּי׃ <WH2204> am old

הֲיִפָּלֵ֥א <WH6381> too hard מֵיְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Jehovah דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> any thing לַמּוֹעֵ֞ד <WH4150> time אָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> I will return אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> about כָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> unto thee according to the time חַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> of life וּלְשָׂרָ֥ה <WH8283> and Sarah בֵֽן׃ <WH1121> shall have a son

וַתְּכַחֵ֨שׁ <WH3584> denied שָׂרָ֧ה ׀ <WH8283> Then Sarah לֵאמֹ֛ר <WH559> saying לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nay צָחַ֖קְתִּי <WH6711> I laughed כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for יָרֵ֑אָה <WH3372> not for she was afraid וַיֹּ֥אמֶר ׀ <WH559> And he said לֹ֖א <WH3808> No כִּ֥י <WH3588> did צָחָֽקְתְּ׃ <WH6711> but thou didst laugh

וַיָּקֻ֤מוּ <WH6965> rose up מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> And the men וַיַּשְׁקִ֖פוּ <WH8259> from thence and looked עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> toward סְדֹ֑ם <WH5467> Sodom וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> and Abraham הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> went עִמָּ֖ם <WH5973> them לְשַׁלְּחָֽם׃ <WH7971> with them to bring them on the way

וַֽיהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אָמָ֑ר <WH559> said הַֽמְכַסֶּ֤ה <WH3680> Shall I hide אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I מֵֽאַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> from Abraham אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> that thing which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> I do

וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> Seeing that Abraham הָי֧וֹ <WH1961> will surely יִֽהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> become לְג֥וֹי <WH1471> nation גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> shall surely become a great וְעָצ֑וּם <WH6099> and mighty וְנִ֨בְרְכוּ <WH1288> shall be blessed ב֔וֹ כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all גּוֹיֵ֥י <WH1471> and all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יְדַעְתִּ֗יו <WH3045> For I know לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> so אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> him that יְצַוֶּ֜ה <WH6680> he will command אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֤יו <WH1121> his children וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> and his household אַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> after him וְשָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> and they shall keep דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> the way יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do צְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> justice וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> and judgment לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> so הָבִ֤יא <WH935> may bring יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> about אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> upon Abraham אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> that which he hath spoken עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> about

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD זַעֲקַ֛ת <WH2201> Because the cry סְדֹ֥ם <WH5467> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֖ה <WH6017> and Gomorrah כִּי־ <WH3588> is indeed רָ֑בָּה <WH7227> is great וְחַ֨טָּאתָ֔ם <WH2403> and because their sin כִּ֥י <WH3588> is indeed כָבְדָ֖ה <WH3513> grievous מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> is very

אֵֽרֲדָה־ <WH3381> I will go down נָּ֣א <WH4994> now וְאֶרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> now and see הַכְּצַעֲקָתָ֛הּ <WH6818> according to the cry הַבָּ֥אָה <WH935> of it which is come אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about עָשׂ֣וּ ׀ <WH6213> whether they have done כָּלָ֑ה <WH3617> altogether וְאִם־ <WH518> and if לֹ֖א <WH3808> not אֵדָֽעָה׃ <WH3045> unto me and if not I will know

וַיִּפְנ֤וּ <WH6437> turned their faces מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> the men וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> and went סְדֹ֑מָה <WH5467> toward Sodom וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> but Abraham עוֹדֶ֥נּוּ <WH5750> yet עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיִּגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> drew near אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> And Abraham וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said הַאַ֣ף <WH637> indeed תִּסְפֶּ֔ה <WH5595> Wilt thou also destroy צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> the righteous עִם־ <WH5973> with רָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> wicked

אוּלַ֥י <WH194> Suppose יֵ֛שׁ <WH3426> Peradventure there be חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty צַדִּיקִ֖ם <WH6662> righteous בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> within הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> the city הַאַ֤ף <WH637> indeed תִּסְפֶּה֙ <WH5595> wilt thou also destroy וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not תִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> and not spare לַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> the place לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> for חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> the fifty הַצַּדִּיקִ֖ם <WH6662> righteous אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃ <WH7130> among

חָלִ֨לָה <WH2486> That be far לְּךָ֜ מֵעֲשֹׂ֣ת ׀ <WH6213> from thee to do כַּדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> after this manner הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> such לְהָמִ֤ית <WH4191> to slay צַדִּיק֙ <WH6662> the righteous עִם־ <WH5973> with רָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> with the wicked וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become כַצַּדִּ֖יק <WH6662> and that the righteous כָּרָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> should be as the wicked חָלִ֣לָה <WH2486> that be far לָּ֔ךְ הֲשֹׁפֵט֙ <WH8199> from thee Shall not the Judge כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of all the earth לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> do מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> adversary

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אִם־ <WH518> If אֶמְצָ֥א <WH4672> If I find בִסְדֹ֛ם <WH5467> in Sodom חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty צַדִּיקִ֖ם <WH6662> righteous בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> within הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> the city וְנָשָׂ֥אתִי <WH5375> then I will spare לְכָל־ <WH3605> the whole הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> all the place בַּעֲבוּרָֽם׃ <WH5668> their account

וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> And Abraham וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold נָ֤א <WH4994> Now הוֹאַ֙לְתִּי֙ <WH2974> Behold now I have taken upon me לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> to speak אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנָ֔י <WH136> unto the Lord וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> which עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> [am but] dust וָאֵֽפֶר׃ <WH665> and ashes

א֠וּלַי <WH194> Suppose יַחְסְר֞וּן <WH2637> Peradventure there shall lack חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> of the fifty הַצַּדִּיקִם֙ <WH6662> righteous חֲמִשָּׁ֔ה <WH2568> five הֲתַשְׁחִ֥ית <WH7843> wilt thou destroy בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> and five אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> all the city וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> answer לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אַשְׁחִ֔ית <WH7843> I will not destroy אִם־ <WH518> if אֶמְצָ֣א <WH4672> If I find שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> there forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> five
